class Person {

  Person(this.firstName, this.lastName);

  // é‡å†™ `==` æ“ä½œç¬¦

  bool operator ==(Object other) {
    return other is Person &&
        other.firstName == firstName &&
        other.lastName == lastName;
  }
}

void main() {
  var p1 = Person('Bob', 'Smith');
  var p2 = Person('Bob', 'Smith');
  var p3 = 'not a person';

  assert(p1 == p2);
  assert(p1 != p3);
}

import 'dart:math';

class Point {
  final double x;
  final double y;

  Point(this.x, this.y);

  double distanceTo(Point other) {
    var dx = x - other.x;
    var dy = y - other.y;
    return sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
  }
}

æ“ä½œç¬¦æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å…·æœ‰ç‰¹æ®Šåå­—çš„å®ä¾‹æ–¹æ³•ã€‚Dartè¯­è¨€å…è®¸æˆ‘ä»¬å®šä¹‰å¦‚ä¸‹æ“ä½œç¬¦ï¼š

æˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡å†…ç½®çš„æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦operatoræ¥ç”³æ˜ä¸€ä¸ªæ“ä½œç¬¦ã€‚å¦‚ä¸‹ä»£ç æ ·ä¾‹ï¼ŒVectorç±»ç”³æ˜äº†åŠ (+)ï¼Œå‡(-)å’Œç›¸ç­‰(==)ä¸‰ä¸ªæ“ä½œç¬¦ï¼ˆæˆ–è€…æ–¹æ³•ï¼‰ï¼š

class Vector {
  final int x, y;

  Vector(this.x, this.y);

  Vector operator +(Vector v) => Vector(x + v.x, y + v.y);
  Vector operator -(Vector v) => Vector(x - v.x, y - v.y);

  @override
  bool operator ==(Object other) =>
      other is Vector && x == other.x && y == other.y;

  @override
  int get hashCode => Object.hash(x, y);
}

void main() {
  final v = Vector(2, 3);
  final w = Vector(2, 2);

  assert(v + w == Vector(4, 5));
  assert(v - w == Vector(0, 1));
}

Getterså’ŒSettersæ˜¯è¯»å†™å¯¹è±¡å±æ€§çš„ç‰¹æ®Šæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå…¶å®æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®ä¾‹å˜é‡éƒ½éšå«æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªGetteræ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆå¦‚ï¼šobject.xï¼‰å’Œä¸€ä¸ªSetteræ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆå¦‚ï¼šobject.x = ‘xxx’ï¼‰ã€‚

class Rectangle {
  double left, top, width, height;

  Rectangle(this.left, this.top, this.width, this.height);

  // `right` é¢å¤–å±æ€§
  double get right => left + width;
  set right(double value) => left = value - width;

  // `bottom` é¢å¤–å±æ€§
  double get bottom => top + height;
  set bottom(double value) => top = value - height;
}

void main() {
  var rect = Rectangle(3, 4, 20, 15);
  assert(rect.left == 3);
  rect.right = 12;
  assert(rect.left == -8);
}

class Point {
  final double x;
  final double y;

      : x = x,
        y = y,

class Logger {
  final String name;
  bool mute = false;

  static final Map<String, Logger> _cache = <String, Logger>{};

  // ä¼˜å…ˆä»ç¼“å­˜è·å–å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™æ–°å¢
  factory Logger(String name) {
    print('é»˜è®¤æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼š$name');
    return _cache.putIfAbsent(name, () => Logger._internal(name));
  }

  // å‘½åæ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å·¥å‚æ„é€ å‡½æ•°è·å–å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆç¼“å­˜ï¼Œæˆ–æ–°å¢ï¼‰
  factory Logger.fromJson(Map<String, Object> json) {
    print('å‘½åæ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼š$json');
    return Logger(json['name'].toString());
  }

  Logger._internal(this.name);

  void log(String msg) {
    if (!mute) print(msg);
  }
}

// `Person`ç±»ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯`Persion`æ¥å£ï¼ŒåŒ…å«`greet()`æ–¹æ³•
class Person {
  // å±äºæ¥å£çš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¯¹å¤–ä¸å¯è§
  final String _name;

  // æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¸å±äºæ¥å£ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†
  Person(this._name);

  // æ™®é€šæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå±äºæ¥å£ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†
  String greet(String who) => 'Hello, $who. I am $_name.';
}

// å®ç°`Person`æ¥å£
class Impostor implements Person {
  String get _name => '';

  String greet(String who) => 'Hi $who. Do you know who I am?';
}

String greetBob(Person person) => person.greet('Bob');

void main() {
  print(greetBob(Person('Kathy'))); // Hello, Bob. I am Kathy.

import 'dart:math';

class Point {
  double x, y;
  Point(this.x, this.y);

  static double distanceBetween(Point a, Point b) {
    var dx = a.x - b.x;
    var dy = a.y - b.y;
    return sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
  }
}

void main() {
  var a = Point(2, 2);
  var b = Point(4, 4);
  var distance = Point.distanceBetween(a, b);
  assert(2.8 < distance && distance < 2.9);
  print(distance);
}

abstract mixin class Iterable<E> {
  // é»˜è®¤è¿”å›å€¼ï¼šfalse
  bool any(bool test(E element)) {
    for (E element in this) {
      if (test(element)) return true;
    }
    return false;
  }

  // é»˜è®¤è¿”å›å€¼ï¼štrue
  bool every(bool test(E element)) {
    for (E element in this) {
      if (!test(element)) return false;
    }
    return true;
  }
}

class InvalidPriceException {}

class ShoppingCart {
  // ä¸‹åˆ’çº¿å¼€å¤´ï¼Œç§æœ‰å±æ€§
  List<double> _prices = [];
  
  // totalçš„getteræ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·è¿”å›æ€»ä»·æ ¼å€¼
  double get total => _prices.fold(0, (e,t) => e+t);

  set prices(List<double> newPrices) {
    if(newPrices.any((e) => e < 0)) {
      throw InvalidPriceException();
    }
    
    _prices = newPrices;
  }
}

class MyDataObject {
  final int anInt;
  final String aString;
  final double aDouble;

  MyDataObject({
    this.anInt = 1,
    this.aString = 'OLD',
    this.aDouble = 2.0,
  });

  String toString() {
    return 'MyDataObject: {anInt=$anInt, aString=$aString, aDouble=$aDouble}';
  }

  // æœ¬æ–¹æ³•çš„3ä¸ªå…¥å‚å‡ä¸ºå‘½åå‚æ•°
  MyDataObject copyWith({int? newInt, String? newString, double? newDouble}) {
    return MyDataObject(
      anInt: newInt ?? this.anInt,
      aString: newString ?? this.aString,
      aDouble: newDouble ?? this.aDouble,
    );
  }
}

void main() {

  final newDataObject = myDataObject.copyWith(newInt: 2, newString: 'NEW', newDouble: 4.0);

  // ç»“æœï¼š10. å‡½æ•°å‘½åå…¥å‚: myDataObject=MyDataObject: {anInt=1, aString=OLD, aDouble=2.0}, newDataObject=MyDataObject: {anInt=2, aString=NEW, aDouble=4.0}
}

typedef VoidFunction = void Function();

class ExceptionWithMessage {
  final String message;
  const ExceptionWithMessage(this.message);
}

// Call logException to log an exception, and doneLogging when finished.
abstract class Logger {
  void logException(Type t, [String? msg]);
  void doneLogging();
}

void tryFunction(VoidFunction untrustworthy, Logger logger) {
  try {
    untrustworthy();
  } on ExceptionWithMessage catch(e) {
    logger.logException(e.runtimeType, e.message);
  } on Exception {
    logger.logException(Exception);
  } finally {
    logger.doneLogging();
  } 
}

class MyColor1 {

class Square extends Shape {}

class Circle extends Shape {}

class Shape {
  Shape();

  factory Shape.fromTypeName(String typeName) {
    if (typeName == 'square') return Square();
    if (typeName == 'circle') return Circle();

    throw ArgumentError('Unrecognized $typeName');
  }
}

class MyDataObject {
  final int anInt;
  final String aString;
  final double aDouble;

  MyDataObject({
    this.anInt = 1,
    this.aString = 'OLD',
    this.aDouble = 2.0,
  });

  String toString() {
    return 'MyDataObject: {anInt=$anInt, aString=$aString, aDouble=$aDouble}';
  }

  // æœ¬æ–¹æ³•çš„3ä¸ªå…¥å‚å‡ä¸ºå‘½åå‚æ•°
  MyDataObject copyWith({int? newInt, String? newString, double? newDouble}) {
    return MyDataObject(
      anInt: newInt ?? this.anInt,
      aString: newString ?? this.aString,
      aDouble: newDouble ?? this.aDouble,
    );
  }
}

class FirstTwoLetters {
  final String letterOne;
  final String letterTwo;

  // åˆå§‹åŒ–åˆ—è¡¨
  FirstTwoLetters(String word)
      : assert(word.length >= 2),
        letterOne = word[0],
        letterTwo = word[1];

  String toString() {
    return 'FirstTwoLetters: {letterOne=$letterOne, letterTwo=$letterTwo}';
  }
}

class ImmutablePoint {
  static const ImmutablePoint origin = ImmutablePoint(0, 0);

  // ç±»å±æ€§å¿…é¡»ç”¨finalä¿®é¥°
  final int x;
  final int y;

void main() {
  // 1. å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ’å€¼
  var a = 2;
  var b = 3;
  var c = 'Hello';
  print(
      '1. å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ’å€¼: ${c.toUpperCase()} Dart:a is ${a} and b is ${b}, so a>b is ${a > b}, a+b=${a + b}');

  // 2. å˜é‡èµ‹å€¼
  // éæ³•å£°æ˜ï¼šint d = null; String s;
  int d = 4;
  int? e;
  String f = 'Hello';
  String? g;
  print('2. å˜é‡èµ‹å€¼: d: ${d}, e:${e}, f:${f}, g:${g}');

  // 3. ç©ºè¿ç®—ç¬¦
  int? h;
  h ??= 3;
  h ??= 5; // ä¸ç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ­¤æ—¶héç©º
  int i = 1 ?? 3; // 1éç©ºï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥3ä¸ç”Ÿæ•ˆ
  int j = null ?? 4;
  print('3. ç©ºè¿ç®—ç¬¦: h=${h}, i=${i}, j=${j}');

  // 4. è®¿é—®ç©ºå¯¹è±¡å±æ€§
  String? k;
  String? l = 'Hello';
  var m = k?.toLowerCase()?.toUpperCase();
  var n = l?.toLowerCase()?.toUpperCase();
  print('4. è®¿é—®ç©ºå¯¹è±¡å±æ€§: m=${m}, n=${n}');

  // 5. é›†åˆç±»å‹
  var aList = <String>['a', 'b', 'b'];
  var aSet = <String>{'a', 'b', 'b'};
  var aMap = <String, String>{'a': 'Hello', 'b': 'World', 'b': 'Dart'};
  print('5. é›†åˆç±»å‹: aList=${aList}, aSet=${aSet}, aMap=${aMap}');

  // 6. ç®­å¤´è¯­æ³•å‡½æ•°
  String joinWithCommas(List<int> values) => values.join(',');
  final cList = <int>[2, 5, 7];
  print('6. ç®­å¤´è¯­æ³•å‡½æ•°: cList join=${joinWithCommas(cList)}');

  // 8. å‡½æ•°å¯é€‰ä½ç½®å…¥å‚
  int sumUpToFive(int a, [int? b, int? c, int? d, int? e]) {
    return a + (b ?? 0) + (c ?? 0) + (d ?? 0) + (e ?? 0);
  }

  int sumUpToFive2(int a, [int b = 2, int c = 3, int d = 4, int e = 5]) {
    return a + b + c + d + e;
  }

  print(
      '8. å‡½æ•°å¯é€‰ä½ç½®å…¥å‚: sumUpToFive(1,2)=${sumUpToFive(1, 2)}, sumUpToFive(1,2,3)=${sumUpToFive(1, 2, 3)}');
  print(
      '8. å‡½æ•°å¯é€‰ä½ç½®å…¥å‚: sumUpToFive2(1,1)=${sumUpToFive2(1, 1)}, sumUpToFive2(1,1,1)=${sumUpToFive2(1, 1, 1)}');

  // 10. å‡½æ•°å‘½åå…¥å‚
  final myDataObject = MyDataObject();
  final newDataObject = myDataObject.copyWith(newInt: 2, newString: 'NEW', newDouble: 4.0);
  print('10. å‡½æ•°å‘½åå…¥å‚: myDataObject=$myDataObject, newDataObject=$newDataObject');

  // 13. æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•ï¼šåˆå§‹åŒ–åˆ—è¡¨
  final firstTwoLetters = FirstTwoLetters('Dart');
  print('13. æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•ï¼šåˆå§‹åŒ–åˆ—è¡¨: firstTwoLetters=$firstTwoLetters');
}

CREATE TABLE nt_param
(
    id          bigint unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
    category    varchar(64) NOT NULL,
    module      varchar(64) NOT NULL,
    name        varchar(64) NOT NULL,

    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    UNIQUE (category, module, name)
);

     * SpringBootå¯åŠ¨

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        SpringApplication.run(NTBootApplication.class, args);
    }

    /**
     * DataSourceé…ç½®
     */
    @Bean(name = "ntDataSource", initMethod = "init", destroyMethod = "close")
    public DruidDataSource ntDataSource(@Value("${ntopic.datasource.url}") String url
            , @Value("${ntopic.datasource.userName}") String userName
            , @Value("${ntopic.datasource.password}") String password) {
        DruidDataSource dataSource = new DruidDataSource();
        dataSource.setUrl(url);
        dataSource.setUsername(userName);
        dataSource.setPassword(password);

        dataSource.setInitialSize(0);
        dataSource.setMinIdle(1);
        dataSource.setMaxActive(5);
        dataSource.setMaxWait(3000L);

        return dataSource;
    }

    /**
     * MyBatisäº‹åŠ¡é…ç½®
     */
    @Bean("ntSqlSessionFactory")
    public SqlSessionFactoryBean ntSqlSessionFactory(@Qualifier("ntDataSource") DataSource dataSource) {
        SqlSessionFactoryBean sqlSessionFactoryBean = new SqlSessionFactoryBean();
        sqlSessionFactoryBean.setDataSource(dataSource);

        Configuration configuration = new Configuration();
        configuration.setMapUnderscoreToCamelCase(true);
        sqlSessionFactoryBean.setConfiguration(configuration);

        return sqlSessionFactoryBean;
    }

    /** å…¶ä»–ä»£ç çœç•¥ */
}

/**
 * Author: obullxl@163.com
 * Copyright (c) 2020-2021 All Rights Reserved.
 */
package cn.ntopic.das.dao;

import cn.ntopic.das.model.UserBaseDO;
import org.apache.commons.lang3.RandomUtils;
import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
import org.junit.Assert;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Qualifier;
import org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTest;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.AbstractJUnit4SpringContextTests;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.SpringRunner;

import java.util.Date;

/**
 * @author obullxl 2021å¹´10æœˆ17æ—¥: æ–°å¢
 */
@SpringBootTest
@RunWith(SpringRunner.class)
public class UserBaseDAOTest extends AbstractJUnit4SpringContextTests {

    @Autowired
    @Qualifier("userBaseDAO")
    private UserBaseDAO userBaseDAO;

    /**
     * CRUDç®€å•æµ‹è¯•
     */
    @Test
    public void test_insert_select_update_delete() {
        final String id = "ID-" + RandomUtils.nextLong();
        final String name = "NAME-" + RandomUtils.nextLong();

        // 1. æ¸…ç†æ•°æ®
        this.userBaseDAO.deleteById(id);
        this.userBaseDAO.deleteByName(name);

        // è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ® - éªŒè¯
        UserBaseDO userBaseDO = this.userBaseDAO.selectById(id);
        Assert.assertNull(userBaseDO);

        userBaseDO = this.userBaseDAO.selectByName(name);
        Assert.assertNull(userBaseDO);

        try {
            // 2. æ–°å¢æ•°æ®
            UserBaseDO newUserDO = new UserBaseDO();
            newUserDO.setId(id);
            newUserDO.setName(name);
            newUserDO.setCreateTime(new Date());
            newUserDO.setModifyTime(new Date());
            this.userBaseDAO.insert(newUserDO);

            // 3. æ•°æ®æŸ¥è¯¢ - æ–°å¢éªŒè¯
            UserBaseDO checkUserDO = this.userBaseDAO.selectById(id);
            Assert.assertNotNull(checkUserDO);
            Assert.assertEquals(name, checkUserDO.getName());
            Assert.assertNotNull(checkUserDO.getCreateTime());
            Assert.assertNotNull(checkUserDO.getModifyTime());
            Assert.assertTrue(StringUtils.isBlank(checkUserDO.getRoleList()));

            // 4. æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®
            int update = this.userBaseDAO.updateRoleList(id, new Date(), "ADMIN,DATA");
            Assert.assertEquals(1, update);

            // æ›´æ–°æ•°æ® - éªŒè¯
            checkUserDO = this.userBaseDAO.selectById(id);
            Assert.assertNotNull(checkUserDO);
            Assert.assertEquals("ADMIN,DATA", checkUserDO.getRoleList());

            // 5. æ•°æ®åˆ é™¤
            int delete = this.userBaseDAO.deleteById(id);
            Assert.assertEquals(1, delete);

            delete = this.userBaseDAO.deleteByName(name);
            Assert.assertEquals(0, delete);
        } finally {
            // æ¸…ç†æ•°æ®
            this.userBaseDAO.deleteById(id);
        }
    }
}

<build>
    <plugins>
        <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.3.2</version>
            <configuration>
                <source>1.8</source>
                <target>1.8</target>
                <encoding>UTF-8</encoding>
            </configuration>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.5</version>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.1.2</version>
            <executions>
                <execution>
                    <phase>package</phase>
                    <goals>
                        <goal>jar</goal>
                    </goals>
                </execution>
            </executions>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
            <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
            <artifactId>build-helper-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>1.9.1</version>
            <executions>
                <execution>
                    <id>timestamp-property</id>
                    <goals>
                        <goal>timestamp-property</goal>
                    </goals>
                </execution>
            </executions>
            <configuration>
                <name>BuildTime</name>
                <pattern>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS</pattern>
                <timeZone>GMT+8</timeZone>
                <regex/>
                <source/>
                <value/>
            </configuration>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>1.3</version>
            <executions>
                <execution>
                    <id>generate-release</id>
                    <phase>compile</phase>
                    <goals>
                        <goal>run</goal>
                    </goals>
                    <configuration>
                        <tasks>
                            <!--suppress UnresolvedMavenProperty -->
                            <echo file="${project.basedir}/target/classes/NTopic.Release" message="Version=${project.version}${line.separator}BuildTime=${BuildTime}" />
                        </tasks>
                    </configuration>
                </execution>
            </executions>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-deploy-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.7</version>
            <configuration>
                <!-- ç‰¹åˆ«æ³¨æ„çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼šæŒ‡å®šæ‰“åŒ…çš„ç›®å½• -->
                <altDeploymentRepository>internal.repo::default::file://${project.basedir}/../maven-repository/repository</altDeploymentRepository>
            </configuration>
        </plugin>
    </plugins>
</build>

DruidDataSource dataSource = new DruidDataSource();
dataSource.setUrl("jdbc:sqlite:/Users/obullxl/CodeSpace/sequence-jdbc/SequenceJDBC.sqlite");
dataSource.setDriverClassName("org.sqlite.JDBC");
dataSource.setPoolPreparedStatements(false);
dataSource.setMaxPoolPreparedStatementPerConnectionSize(-1);
dataSource.setTestOnBorrow(true);

// 2. åˆå§‹åŒ–åºåˆ—ç»„ä»¶

@Qualifier("ntSequence")

long newUserId3 = ntSequence.next("USER");

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=no">
    <title>ntopic.cn</title>
    <style type="text/css">
        .iframe-wrap {
            position: relative;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: unset;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }

        .iframe {
            color-scheme: light;
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            width: 1px;
            min-width: 100%;
            max-width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            border: 0;
        }
    </style>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function onWindowLoad() {
            window.setInterval("reInitIframe()", 250);
        }

        function reInitIframe() {
            const iframe = document.getElementById("iframe");
            try {
                const newHeight = iframe.contentWindow.document.documentElement.scrollHeight;
              	iframe.style.height = newHeight + "px";
                document.getElementById("iframeWrap").style.height = newHeight + "px";
            } catch (e) {
            }
        }
    </script>
</head>
<body onload="onWindowLoad();">
<div id="iframeWrap" class="iframe-wrap" style="height: 269px;">
    <iframe id="iframe" class="frame" src="https://ntopic.cn" loading="lazy" style="width:100%;" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>
</div>
</body>
</html>

package cn.ntopic.order;

import cn.ntopic.ListResult;
import cn.ntopic.order.dto.OrderDTO;
import cn.ntopic.order.model.OrderModel;
import org.apache.commons.collections4.CollectionUtils;
import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Qualifier;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

import java.time.LocalDate;
import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.stream.Collectors;

/**
 * è®¢å•æŸ¥è¯¢æœåŠ¡å®ç°
 *
 * @author obullxl 2023å¹´05æœˆ20æ—¥: æ–°å¢
 */
@Component("orderQueryService")
public class OrderQueryServiceImpl implements OrderQueryService {

    /**
     * è®¢å•æŸ¥è¯¢å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼Œè¿œç¨‹æœåŠ¡ä¸å¯æ§
     */
    private final OrderQueryClient orderQueryClient;

    public OrderQueryServiceImpl(@Qualifier("orderQueryClient") OrderQueryClient orderQueryClient) {
        this.orderQueryClient = orderQueryClient;
    }

    @Override
    public ListResult<OrderModel> findList(List<String> orderIdList) {
        // å‚æ•°æ ¡éªŒ
        if (CollectionUtils.isEmpty(orderIdList)) {
            return new ListResult<>(true);
        }

        // è®¢å•IDè¿‡æ»¤ï¼šå‡è®¾ä»…æ”¯æŒ3ä¸ªæœˆå†…å®¹çš„è®¢å•
        List<String> destOrderIdList = orderIdList.stream().filter(this::filterOrderId).collect(Collectors.toList());

        ListResult<OrderModel> orderResult;
        try {
            // æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•ä¿¡æ¯
            List<OrderDTO> orderList = this.orderQueryClient.queryList(destOrderIdList);

            // è®¢å•æ¨¡å‹è½¬æ¢
            List<OrderModel> modelList = orderList.stream().map(OrderModel::from).collect(Collectors.toList());

            // è¿”å›æˆåŠŸç»“æœ
            orderResult = new ListResult<>(true);
            orderResult.setResultObj(modelList);
        } catch (Throwable e) {
            // æµ‹è¯•æ—¥å¿—è¾“å‡º
            orderResult = new ListResult<>(false);
            orderResult.setCode("UNKNOWN_ERROR");
            orderResult.setMessage(e.getMessage());
        }

        return orderResult;
    }

    /**
     * yyyyMMddæ—¥æœŸæ£€æŸ¥ï¼šè®¢å•IDæ ¼å¼ä¸ºæ—¥æœŸå¼€å¤´ï¼Œä¸”æ—¥æœŸä¸ºæœ€è¿‘3ä¸ªæœˆå†…
     */
    private boolean filterOrderId(String orderId) {
        if (StringUtils.length(orderId) < 8) {
            return false;
        }

        // 3ä¸ªæœˆçš„æ—¥æœŸ
        LocalDate minOrderDate = LocalDate.now().minusMonths(3L);

        // å½“å‰è®¢å•çš„æ—¥æœŸ
        LocalDate orderDate;
        try {
            String prefix = StringUtils.substring(orderId, 0, 8);
            orderDate = LocalDate.parse(prefix, DateTimeFormatter.BASIC_ISO_DATE);

            // æ¯”è¾ƒæ˜¯å¦ä¸º3ä¸ªæœˆä¹‹å†…
            return !orderDate.isBefore(minOrderDate);
        } catch (DateTimeParseException e) {
            return false;
        }
    }
}

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨
     *
     * @param orderIdList è®¢å•IDåˆ—è¡¨

}

package cn.ntopic.example.mockito;

import cn.ntopic.ListResult;
import cn.ntopic.NTAbstractTest;
import cn.ntopic.order.OrderQueryClient;
import cn.ntopic.order.OrderQueryService;
import cn.ntopic.order.dto.OrderDTO;
import cn.ntopic.order.enums.OrderStatusEnum;
import cn.ntopic.order.model.OrderModel;
import com.google.common.collect.Lists;
import org.junit.Assert;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.mockito.ArgumentCaptor;
import org.mockito.Mockito;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Qualifier;
import org.springframework.boot.test.mock.mockito.MockBean;

import java.time.LocalDate;
import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * OrderService-å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•
 *
 * @author obullxl 2023å¹´05æœˆ20æ—¥: æ–°å¢
 */
public class OrderQueryServiceTest extends NTAbstractTest {

    /**
     * æµ‹è¯•å¯¹è±¡
     */
    @Autowired
    @Qualifier("orderQueryService")
    private OrderQueryService orderQueryService;

    /**
     * Mockå¯¹è±¡
     */
    @MockBean
    @Autowired
    @Qualifier("orderQueryClient")
    private OrderQueryClient orderQueryClient;

    /**
     * Case01-æ­£å¸¸è¿”å›ï¼šæµ‹è¯•è¿‡æ»¤3ä¸ªæœˆå†…è®¢å•é€»è¾‘
     */
    @Test
    public void test_queryList_01() {
        final String orderId1 = LocalDate.now().format(DateTimeFormatter.BASIC_ISO_DATE) + "0001";
        final String orderId2 = LocalDate.now().minusMonths(3L).format(DateTimeFormatter.BASIC_ISO_DATE) + "0002";
        final String orderId3 = LocalDate.now().minusMonths(3L).minusDays(1L).format(DateTimeFormatter.BASIC_ISO_DATE) + "0003";

        // 1. Mockå®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        // æ­£å¸¸ä¸è¿‡æ»¤çš„è®¢å•
        OrderDTO orderDTO1 = new OrderDTO();
        orderDTO1.setId(orderId1);
        orderDTO1.setAmount("3.33");
        orderDTO1.setStatus(OrderStatusEnum.WAIT_PAY.getCode());

        // åˆšå¥½3ä¸ªæœˆçš„ä¸´ç•Œå€¼ï¼Œä¸è¿‡æ»¤çš„è®¢å•
        OrderDTO orderDTO2 = new OrderDTO();
        orderDTO2.setId(orderId2);
        orderDTO2.setAmount("4.44");
        orderDTO2.setStatus(OrderStatusEnum.FINISHED.getCode());

        Mockito.when(this.orderQueryClient.queryList(Mockito.anyList())).thenReturn(Lists.newArrayList(orderDTO1, orderDTO2));

        // 2. æ‰§è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢é€»è¾‘
        ListResult<OrderModel> orderResult = this.orderQueryService.findList(Lists.newArrayList(orderId1, orderId2, orderId3));

        // 3. æ£€æŸ¥æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœï¼šæ­£å¸¸è¿”å›ï¼ŒorderId3è¢«è¿‡æ»¤
        Assert.assertTrue(orderResult.isSuccess());

        List<OrderModel> modeList = orderResult.getResultObj();
        Assert.assertEquals(2, modeList.size());

        ArgumentCaptor<List<String>> captorOrderIdList = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(List.class);
        Mockito.verify(this.orderQueryClient, Mockito.times(1)).queryList(captorOrderIdList.capture());
        List<String> queryOrderIdList = captorOrderIdList.getValue();
        Assert.assertEquals(2, queryOrderIdList.size());
        Assert.assertTrue(queryOrderIdList.contains(orderId1));
        Assert.assertTrue(queryOrderIdList.contains(orderId2));
    }

    /**
     * Case02-å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å¼‚å¸¸ï¼šæµ‹è¯•è®¢å•å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å¼‚å¸¸é€»è¾‘
     */
    @Test
    public void test_queryList_02() {
        final String orderId1 = LocalDate.now().format(DateTimeFormatter.BASIC_ISO_DATE) + "0001";
        final String orderId2 = LocalDate.now().minusMonths(3L).format(DateTimeFormatter.BASIC_ISO_DATE) + "0002";
        final String orderId3 = LocalDate.now().minusMonths(3L).minusDays(1L).format(DateTimeFormatter.BASIC_ISO_DATE) + "0003";
        final String errorMessage = "Mockå¼‚å¸¸";

        // 1. Mockå®¢æˆ·ç«¯æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸
        Mockito.when(this.orderQueryClient.queryList(Mockito.anyList())).thenThrow(new RuntimeException(errorMessage));

        // 2. æ‰§è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢é€»è¾‘
        ListResult<OrderModel> orderResult = this.orderQueryService.findList(Lists.newArrayList(orderId1, orderId2, orderId3));

        // 3. æ£€æŸ¥æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢å¼‚å¸¸ï¼ŒorderId3è¢«è¿‡æ»¤
        Assert.assertFalse(orderResult.isSuccess());
        Assert.assertEquals("UNKNOWN_ERROR", orderResult.getCode());
        Assert.assertEquals(errorMessage, orderResult.getMessage());

        ArgumentCaptor<List<String>> captorOrderIdList = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(List.class);
        Mockito.verify(this.orderQueryClient, Mockito.atLeast(1)).queryList(captorOrderIdList.capture());
        List<String> queryOrderIdList = captorOrderIdList.getValue();
        Assert.assertEquals(2, queryOrderIdList.size());
        Assert.assertTrue(queryOrderIdList.contains(orderId1));
        Assert.assertTrue(queryOrderIdList.contains(orderId2));
    }
}

package cn.ntopic;

import cn.ntopic.core.builder.ToString;

/**
 * è¯·æ±‚ç»“æœåŒ…è£…å™¨
 *
 * @author obullxl 2023å¹´05æœˆ20æ—¥: æ–°å¢
 */
public class Result<T> extends ToString {

    /**
     * ç»“æœæˆåŠŸæ ‡è¯†
     */
    private final boolean success;

    /**
     * ç»“æœè¿”å›ç ï¼ˆå¦‚å¤±è´¥é”™è¯¯ç ã€å¹‚ç­‰æˆåŠŸæ ‡è¯†ç­‰ï¼‰
     */
    private String code;

    /**
     * ç»“æœè¿”å›æè¿°
     */
    private String message;

    /**
     * ç»“æœå¯¹è±¡
     */
    private T resultObj;

    public Result(boolean success) {
        this.success = success;
    }

package cn.ntopic.order.model;

import cn.ntopic.order.dto.OrderDTO;
import cn.ntopic.order.enums.OrderStatusEnum;
import cn.ntopic.core.builder.ToString;
import org.springframework.util.Assert;

import java.math.BigDecimal;

/**
 * è®¢å•å¯¹è±¡
 *
 * @author obullxl 2023å¹´05æœˆ20æ—¥: æ–°å¢
 */
public class OrderModel extends ToString {

    /**
     * è®¢å•IDï¼Œéç©º
     */
    private String id;

    /**
     * è®¢å•é‡‘é¢
     */
    private BigDecimal amount;

    /**
     * è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€
     */
    private OrderStatusEnum status;

    /**
     * æ„å»ºè®¢å•æ¨¡å‹
     */
    public static OrderModel from(OrderDTO orderDTO) {
        Assert.notNull(orderDTO, "OrderDTOå…¥å‚ä¸ºNULL.");

        OrderModel orderModel = new OrderModel();
        orderModel.setId(orderDTO.getId());
        orderModel.setAmount(new BigDecimal(orderDTO.getAmount()));
        orderModel.setStatus(OrderStatusEnum.convert(orderDTO.getStatus()).orElse(OrderStatusEnum.UNKNOWN));

        return orderModel;
    }

    public String getId() {
        return id;
    }

    public void setId(String id) {
        this.id = id;
    }

    public BigDecimal getAmount() {
        return amount;
    }

    public void setAmount(BigDecimal amount) {
        this.amount = amount;
    }

    public OrderStatusEnum getStatus() {
        return status;
    }

    public void setStatus(OrderStatusEnum status) {
        this.status = status;
    }
}

package cn.ntopic.order.enums;

import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Optional;

/**
 * è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€æšä¸¾
 *
 * @author obullxl 2023å¹´05æœˆ20æ—¥: æ–°å¢
 */
public enum OrderStatusEnum {

    UNKNOWN(0, "æœªçŸ¥"),

    WAIT_PAY(3, "åˆ›å»ºå¾…æ”¯ä»˜"),

    CLOSED(5, "æ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶å…³é—­"),

    FINISHED(9, "è®¢å•å·²å®Œæˆ"),

    ;

    /**
     * çŠ¶æ€ä»£ç 
     */
    private final int code;

    /**
     * çŠ¶æ€æè¿°
     */
    private final String message;

    OrderStatusEnum(int code, String message) {
        this.code = code;
        this.message = message;
    }

    /**
     * æšä¸¾è½¬æ¢
     */
    public static Optional<OrderStatusEnum> convert(int code) {
        return Arrays.stream(OrderStatusEnum.values()).filter(e -> code == e.getCode()).findFirst();
    }

    public int getCode() {
        return code;
    }

    public String getMessage() {
        return message;
    }
}

/**

 */
package cn.ntopic.example;

import java.util.concurrent.RecursiveTask;

/**
 * ForkJoinTask--æ•°æ®è®¡ç®—æ ·ä¾‹ï¼šå„ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å­—åŒºé—´ï¼Œè®¡ç®—æ•°å­—çš„ç´¯åŠ å€¼ï¼
 *
 * åŸºæœ¬æ€è·¯--æ€»ä½“ä¸º`æ€»-åˆ†-æ€»`æ€æƒ³ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼äºMapReduceæ€è·¯ï¼š
 *   1. æ‹†åˆ†ä»»åŠ¡ï¼šæ ¹æ®å½“å‰ä»»åŠ¡å‚æ•°ï¼Œå†³ç­–æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œä»»åŠ¡æ‹†åˆ†ï¼›å¦‚æœéœ€è¦æ‹†åˆ†ï¼Œåˆ™æœ¬ä»»åŠ¡çš„ç»“æœä¸ºæ‰€æœ‰æ‹†åˆ†ä»»åŠ¡çš„æ±‡æ€»
 *   2. æ±‡æ€»ä»»åŠ¡ï¼šæ ¹æ®ç¬¬1ç‚¹æ€è·¯ï¼Œç¬¬1ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ä¸ºæ€»ä»»åŠ¡-æ‹†åˆ†å­ä»»åŠ¡-æ±‡æ€»å­ä»»åŠ¡ç»“æœï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆç¬¬1ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡çš„å€¼å°±æ˜¯æœ€ç»ˆçš„å€¼
 *
 * @author obullxl 2023å¹´05æœˆ13æ—¥: æ–°å¢
 */
public class CalculateForkJoinTask extends RecursiveTask<Integer> {
    /** ä»»åŠ¡æ‹†åˆ†çš„é˜ˆå€¼ï¼Œè¶…è¿‡è¯¥å€¼åˆ™ä»»åŠ¡éœ€è¦æ‹†åˆ†*/
    public static final int THRESHOLD = 10;

    /**
     * ä»»åŠ¡å‚æ•°ï¼šæ•°æ®è®¡ç®—çš„å¼€å§‹å€¼
     */
    private final int start;

    /**
     * ä»»åŠ¡å‚æ•°ï¼šæ•°æ®è®¡ç®—çš„ç»“æŸå€¼
     */
    private final int finish;

    public CalculateForkJoinTask(int start, int finish) {
        this.start = start;
        this.finish = finish;
    }

    @Override
    public Integer compute() {
        int sum = 0;

        // æ£€æµ‹å•ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡è®¡ç®—é‡æ˜¯å¦ç¬¦åˆé˜ˆå€¼ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¶…è¿‡äº†çš„è¯è¿›è¡Œä»»åŠ¡æ‹†åˆ†
        if ((this.finish - this.start) <= THRESHOLD) {
            for (int i = start; i <= finish; i++) {
                sum += i;
            }
        } else {
            // å•ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡é‡è¶…è¿‡é˜ˆå€¼ï¼Œåˆ™è¿›è¡Œä»»åŠ¡æ‹†åˆ†ï¼šè¿™é‡Œæ˜¯æ‹†æˆäº†2ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå¯æ ¹æ®ä¸šåŠ¡å®é™…æƒ…å†µæ‹†å‡ºå¤šä¸ªä»»åŠ¡
            int middle = (this.start + this.finish) / 2;

            RecursiveTask<Integer> leftTask = new CalculateForkJoinTask(this.start, middle);
            RecursiveTask<Integer> rightTask = new CalculateForkJoinTask(middle + 1, this.finish);

            // æ‰§è¡Œæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­ä»»åŠ¡ï¼šè¿™é‡Œåªæœ‰2ä¸ªå­ä»»åŠ¡
            leftTask.fork();
            rightTask.fork();

            // ç­‰å¾…å¹¶è·å–æ¯ä¸ªå­ä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œçš„ç»“æŸ
            int leftResult = leftTask.join();
            int rightResult = rightTask.join();

            // åˆå¹¶å­ä»»åŠ¡çš„æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœ
            sum = leftResult + rightResult;
        }

        // æœ¬ä»»åŠ¡çš„ç»“æœï¼šå¯èƒ½æ˜¯æœ€ç»ˆçš„å­ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯èƒ½æ˜¯å¤šä¸ªå­ä»»åŠ¡æ˜¯æ±‡æ€»ç»“æœ
        return sum;
    }
}

/**
 * Author: obullxl@163.com
 * Copyright (c) 2020-2023 All Rights Reserved.
 */
package cn.ntopic.example;

import org.junit.Assert;
import org.junit.Test;

import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
import java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool;
import java.util.concurrent.Future;
import java.util.concurrent.RecursiveTask;

/**
 * CalculateForkJoinTask--æµ‹è¯•éªŒè¯
 *
 * @author obullxl 2023å¹´05æœˆ13æ—¥: æ–°å¢
 */
public class CalculateForkJoinTaskTest {

    @Test
    public void test() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
        // æ„å»ºä»»åŠ¡ï¼šç´¯åŠ 1~100å€¼
        RecursiveTask<Integer> task = new CalculateForkJoinTask(1, 100);

        // æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡
        Future<Integer> result = ForkJoinPool.commonPool().submit(task);

        // éªŒè¯ç»“æœ
        Assert.assertEquals(5050, result.get().intValue());
    }
}
